snippet: American Express is teaming with Vanity Fair and Condé Nast Entertainment for “The Decades Series,” a collection of video clips that will mark the 100th anniversary of Vanity Fair.
lead_paragraph: American Express is teaming with Vanity Fair and Condé Nast Entertainment for “The Decades Series,” a collection of video clips that will mark the 100th anniversary of Vanity Fair.

headline.main: Accounts and People of Note in the Advertising Industry
